title: Холостяк
overview: The Bachelor (Russian: Холостяк, romanized: Holostyak) is a reality show on the TNT channel. Russian adaptation of the popular American project "The Bachelor".The most enviable suitors of the country: young and successful actors, singers, businessmen, sports stars - choose a life partner in front of a million spectators. 25 beautiful girls are fighting for the heart of one bachelor who will get to know them better during a fabulous journey around the world. Every day the Cinderella rivalry becomes more and more dramatic, and the choice of a hero becomes more and more difficult.
